DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare analgesic effectiveness three technique : femoral nerve block , intraarticular infiltration combination control pain total knee arthroplasty ( KA ) . The hypothesis test study performance multimodal postoperative pain KA combine two analgesic technique obtain good analgesia apply separately .
DOC.criteria: intervention program total knee arthroplasty ASA I , II , III 65 year old ASA > III patient refuse realization technical locoregional anesthesia presence coagulopathy impair hemostatic function BMI > 35 Serious intraoperative complication patient undergo bypass aorticfemoral femoro popliteal bypass operate leg patient treat chronic pain diagnosed process , different knee osteoarthritis
